org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.hadoop

Enum HadoopJobProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<HadoopJobProperty>
      • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.hadoop.HadoopJobProperty
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<HadoopJobProperty>

    public enum HadoopJobProperty
extends Enum<HadoopJobProperty>
    Enumeration of optional properties supported by Apache Ignite Hadoop Accelerator.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      COMBINER_HASHMAP_SIZE
      Initial size for hashmap which stores output of mapper and will be used as input of combiner.
      EXTERNAL_CONCURRENT_MAPPERS
      Specifies number of concurrently running mappers for external execution mode.
      EXTERNAL_CONCURRENT_REDUCERS
      Specifies number of concurrently running reducers for external execution mode.
      JOB_PARTIALLY_RAW_COMPARATOR
      Fully qualified name of partially raw comparator which should be used on sorting phase.
      JOB_SHARED_CLASSLOADER
      Whether job classloader can be shared between all tasks.
      JOB_STATUS_POLL_DELAY
      Delay in milliseconds after which Ignite server will reply job status.
      PARTITION_HASHMAP_SIZE
      Initial size for hashmap which stores output of mapper or combiner and will be used as input of reducer.
      SHUFFLE_COMBINER_NO_SORTING
      If set to true then input for combiner will not be sorted by key.
      SHUFFLE_JOB_THROTTLE
      Shuffle job throttle in milliseconds.
      SHUFFLE_MAPPER_STRIPED_OUTPUT
      Whether to stripe mapper output for remote reducers.
      SHUFFLE_MSG_GZIP
      Whether shuffle message should be compressed with GZIP.
      SHUFFLE_MSG_SIZE
      Defines approximate size in bytes of shuffle message which will be passed over wire from mapper to reducer.
      SHUFFLE_OFFHEAP_PAGE_SIZE
      Size in bytes of single memory page which will be allocated for data structures in shuffle.
      SHUFFLE_REDUCER_NO_SORTING
      If set to true then input for reducer will not be sorted by key.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • COMBINER_HASHMAP_SIZE

        public static final HadoopJobProperty COMBINER_HASHMAP_SIZE
        Initial size for hashmap which stores output of mapper and will be used as input of combiner.

        Setting it right allows to avoid rehashing.

      • PARTITION_HASHMAP_SIZE

        public static final HadoopJobProperty PARTITION_HASHMAP_SIZE
        Initial size for hashmap which stores output of mapper or combiner and will be used as input of reducer.

        Setting it right allows to avoid rehashing.

      • EXTERNAL_CONCURRENT_MAPPERS

        public static final HadoopJobProperty EXTERNAL_CONCURRENT_MAPPERS
        Specifies number of concurrently running mappers for external execution mode.

        If not specified, defaults to Runtime.getRuntime().availableProcessors().

      • EXTERNAL_CONCURRENT_REDUCERS

        public static final HadoopJobProperty EXTERNAL_CONCURRENT_REDUCERS
        Specifies number of concurrently running reducers for external execution mode.

        If not specified, defaults to Runtime.getRuntime().availableProcessors().

      • JOB_STATUS_POLL_DELAY

        public static final HadoopJobProperty JOB_STATUS_POLL_DELAY
        Delay in milliseconds after which Ignite server will reply job status.

      • JOB_SHARED_CLASSLOADER

        public static final HadoopJobProperty JOB_SHARED_CLASSLOADER
        Whether job classloader can be shared between all tasks.

        Defaults to true.

      • JOB_PARTIALLY_RAW_COMPARATOR

        public static final HadoopJobProperty JOB_PARTIALLY_RAW_COMPARATOR
        Fully qualified name of partially raw comparator which should be used on sorting phase.

      • SHUFFLE_OFFHEAP_PAGE_SIZE

        public static final HadoopJobProperty SHUFFLE_OFFHEAP_PAGE_SIZE
        Size in bytes of single memory page which will be allocated for data structures in shuffle.

        Defaults to 1Mb.

      • SHUFFLE_COMBINER_NO_SORTING

        public static final HadoopJobProperty SHUFFLE_COMBINER_NO_SORTING
        If set to true then input for combiner will not be sorted by key. Internally hash-map will be used instead of sorted one, so Object.equals(Object) and Object.hashCode() methods of key must be implemented consistently with comparator for that type. Grouping comparator is not supported if this setting is true.

        By default is false.

      • SHUFFLE_REDUCER_NO_SORTING

        public static final HadoopJobProperty SHUFFLE_REDUCER_NO_SORTING
        If set to true then input for reducer will not be sorted by key. Internally hash-map will be used instead of sorted one, so Object.equals(Object) and Object.hashCode() methods of key must be implemented consistently with comparator for that type. Grouping comparator is not supported if this setting is true.

        By default is false.

      • SHUFFLE_MSG_SIZE

        public static final HadoopJobProperty SHUFFLE_MSG_SIZE
        Defines approximate size in bytes of shuffle message which will be passed over wire from mapper to reducer.

        Defaults to 1Mb.

      • SHUFFLE_MSG_GZIP

        public static final HadoopJobProperty SHUFFLE_MSG_GZIP
        Whether shuffle message should be compressed with GZIP.

        Defaults to false.

      • SHUFFLE_MAPPER_STRIPED_OUTPUT

        public static final HadoopJobProperty SHUFFLE_MAPPER_STRIPED_OUTPUT
        Whether to stripe mapper output for remote reducers.

        Defaults to true.

      • SHUFFLE_JOB_THROTTLE

        public static final HadoopJobProperty SHUFFLE_JOB_THROTTLE
        Shuffle job throttle in milliseconds. When job is executed with separate shuffle thread, this parameter controls sleep duration between iterations through intermediate reducer maps.

        Defaults to 0.
